name: Monke In Space
description:
I made this game so that people with most disabilities can play this game(I don't mean to be offensive, that's the reason why I made It).

Story:

Aliens In Pills are appearing out of nowhere and trying to kill the Monke. So you shoot them down with orbs.

Controls:

Press the space bar to spawn an orb.

Hold the space bar to increase the orb's size, continue holding until you aim at your target.

Let go of the space bar In order to shoot It. 

Credits:

Good Times by Trammel Starks.

MONKE!!
